column15: For running a server (daemon)  the current states are: START and STARTED. It would be nice to have transition state: STARTING  and STOPPING.

column14: Preserve cluster id  blueprint name  and blueprint revision in agent local disk
column15: After agent execute commands on behave of the controller  agent should store cluster id  blueprint name and blueprint revision in the local disk to keep track of the current deployment state on the agent.

column14: Make the daemon names and other field names consistent
column15: Following names need to be consistent: Hdfs -> HDFS Mapreduce -> MapReduce Zookeeper -> ZooKeeper HADOOP -> Hadoop

column14: Agent should retry heartbeat message  if controller did not receive the heartbeat
column15: If the heartbeat was not received correctly by the controller  then it should retry.

column14: Remove agent entities beans from public schema xsd
column15: Agent entities beans are located ambari-client: org.apache.ambari.common.rest.entities.agent. Hence  schema xsd generation for public rest api will include agent entities beans. We should move it to org.apache.ambari.common.rest.agent to exclude agent entities to expose to public.

column14: Check for NN safemode during restarts
column15: There is no checks for safemode when we reconfigure the cluster.

column14: Dependency of templeton on hcat client
column15: hcat client should be installed at the templeton server node.

column14: Remove import of mysql puppet module from manifest.
column15: Remove import of mysql puppet module from manifest because this module is deprecated.

column14: Add check to verify jdk path after install
column15: After the jdk install  we do not validate the path. This causes problems during service start in later stages.

column14: PHP Notice: Undefined variable: manifest in /usr/share/hmc/php/puppet/genmanifest/hostsConfig.php
